# Ignore temporary files, build artifacts, and log files
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
UserSettings/

# Ignore auto-generated VS/JetBrains Rider project files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# Ignore crash reports and metadata
*.pid
*.stackdump

# Unity cache directory
[Dd]irectory/

# Ignore packaged files
*.unitypackage

# Ignore hidden folders for Unity
.DS_Store
.idea/
.vscode/
*.apk
*.aab

# GitHub and Git-related files
.gitattributes
.gitignore

# Ignore Python environment files (if present)
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo

# Exclude the stats.json if it is auto-generated
# stats.json

# Optionally, ignore the specific 'stats' folder if it's used for temporary data
stats/

# Ignore the main game executable and related artifacts
*.exe
*.dll
*.app
*.so
*.dylib

# Ignore Unity-generated materials and metadata (if not custom)
*.meta

# Ignore Play mode TestRunner results
*.TestRunner/

# Ignore node_modules (if you are using npm in your Unity project)
node_modules/
